name: HE BEAT HER.
summary:
..That’s what everyone thinks.
But you might find otherwise.. if you pick the right move.

You’re a lawyer, and your client is being accused of abuse. 
You only have 5 minutes until the verdict.

You’re practically powerless.
What will you do in those minutes? 
And can your actions make a difference?

Find the truth. Serve justice.
Play the game.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Visual Novel
